name: 安德烈·塔可夫斯基的牺牲之路
summary: Dedicated to the 80th anniversary of the director. The film uses unique materials related to the years Tarkovsky spent in Italy: Florence, where he lived, and where his museum now exists, at a place called Banja Vignoni, where "Nostalgia" was filmed in the house of the Italian screenwriter Tonino Guerra.
